Name: Battlegrounds2D.IO
About the game: Battlegrounds2D.IO is a battle royale game. The goal of Battlegrounds2D.IO is to be the last man standing. You start as a player with no gear! You have to find weapons, ammo, armor, medical and other items. Kill every other player, except of your teammates üòè. Be careful of the danger zone! Do not move outside of the red circle. Gear up, loot, kill and get the üêî dinner! This version is the same as the browser version of Battlegrounds2D.IO but completely ad-free. Have fun
